column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Come on , get up .
#Text=Now it just tastes like sand .
#Text=I never thought I 'd miss the taste of mud so much .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm awake .
#Text=I could n't sleep .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , we need to get moving if we want to get out of this sand pit .
#Text=" Aang says : " Appa !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Appa ?
#Text=But why would Princess Yue need him ?
#Text=She 's the moon !
#Text=She flies by herself !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's just a cloud .
#Text=Wait !
#Text=A cloud !
#Text=Here , fly up and bend the water from that cloud into my pouch .
#Text=" Katara says : " Wow ... there 's hardly any in here .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , okay !
#Text=It 's a desert cloud ; I did all I could !
#Text=What 's anyone else doing ?!
#Text=What are you doing ?!
#Text=" Katara says : " Trying to keep everyone together .
#Text=Let 's just get moving .
#Text=We need to head this direction .
#Text=" Toph says : " Ow !
#Text=Crud !
#Text=I am so sick of not feeling where I 'm going !
#Text=And what idiot buried a boat in the middle of the desert ?
#Text=" Katara says : " A boat ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Believe me , I kicked it hard enough to feel plenty of vibrations .
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's one of the gliders the sandbenders use !
#Text=And look !
#Text=It 's got some kind of compass on it !
#Text=I bet it can point us out of here !
#Text=Aang , you can bend a breeze so we can sail it .
#Text=We 're going to make it !
#Text=" Fung says : " It is an honor to welcome such a high - ranking member of the Order of the White Lotus .
#Text=Being a Grand Master , you must know so many secrets .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Now that you played Pai Sho , are you going to do some flower arranging , or is someone in this club going to offer some real help ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " You must forgive my nephew .
#Text=He is not an initiate and has little appreciation for the cryptic arts .
#Text=" Florist says : " Who knocks at the guarded gate ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries .
#Text=" Iroh says : " I 'm afraid it 's members only .
#Text=Wait out here .
#Text=" Katara says : " The needle on this compass does n't seem to be pointing north according to my charts .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Take it easy little lady .
#Text=I 'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's what the compass is pointing to !
#Text=That giant rock !
#Text=It must be the magnetic center of the desert .
#Text=" Toph says : " A rock ?!
#Text=Yes !
#Text=Let 's go !
#Text=" Katara says : " Maybe we can find some water there !
#Text=" Aang says : " Maybe we can find some sandbenders .
#Text=" Toph says : " Ahhh ... Finally !
#Text=Solid ground !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice .
#Text=And look !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Tastes like rotten penguin meat !
#Text=Awww , I feel woozy .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave ?!
#Text=" Sokka says : " I have a natural curiosity .
#Text=" Toph says : " I do n't think this is a normal cave .
#Text=This was carved by something .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah ... look at the shape .
#Text=" Toph says : " There 's something buzzing in here .
#Text=Something that 's coming for us !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=That rock almost crushed me !
#Text=" Toph says : " Sorry , I ca n't tell where they are in the air !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I got this one .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , there 's nothing there !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I guess my head 's not as clear as I thought .
#Text="
